meanings.definition: The highest or uppermost part of something.
meanings.sent1: The bird built its nest at the top of the tree.
meanings.sent2: The cat climbed to the top of the stairs.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found a cozy spot at the top of the tree to rest.
meanings.sent4: The sun peeked over the top of the mountain, signaling a new day.
meanings.sent5: The flag fluttered proudly at the top of the pole.

meanings.definition: A lid or cover for a container.
meanings.sent1: Please remember to put the top on the jar after using it.
meanings.sent2: The coffee cup had a small opening on its top for sipping.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten tried to play with the top of the cookie jar.
meanings.sent4: The chef carefully placed the top on the pot to let the soup simmer.
meanings.sent5: The child struggled to open the top of the juice box.

meanings.sent1: She managed to top her previous score in the game.
meanings.sent2: The new movie hopes to top the box office charts.
meanings.sent3: The student aimed to top all others in the spelling bee.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to practice helped him top the competition.
meanings.sent5: The team worked hard to top their rivals in the championship match.
